monster.name: Archon of Redemption
monster.resist: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Angelic Weapons
trait.text: The archon's weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
trait.text: The archon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:
At will: detect evil and good

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: One Being
trait.text: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The "rider" can't be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon's being short of its death.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

action.name: Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the felidar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claws attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the felidar can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The felidar's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The felidar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect evil and good, light, thaumaturgy
1/day each: calm emotions, daylight, dispel evil and good

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The felidar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The felidar's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The felidar makes two attacks with its claws.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
action.text: The felidar touches another creature with its horns. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

action.name: Teleport (1/Day)
action.text: The felidar magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the felidar is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary.name: Claws
legendary.text: The felidar makes one attack with its claws.

legendary.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The felidar creates a shimmering magical eld around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the felidar's next turn.

legendary.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: The felidar magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The kraken's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The kraken can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kraken makes two attacks: one with its claw and one with its tentacles.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

action.name: Lightning Strike (Recharge 5â€“6)
action.text: The kraken hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
